name: Titanomachy (Agggron)
description:
You are a mortal helping the Olympians fight against the Titans in the Titanomachy War! The gods have blessed you with some special abilities, and it is up to you to use them to defeat the Titans!

Controls:
Arrow Keys/WASD - Movement
Z - Basic Attack
X - Splintering Boulder (Special)
C - Wave Dash (Special)
V - Inferno Rage (Special)

Credits:
Programming - Agggron
Art - Aexer
Music - Seth T.T. Scott (All soundtracks) and Soundtweaker (UI sound effects)

We welcome all comments and suggestions! Thank you for playing! :)
